description: I usually pair leeks with potatoes to make a creamy puree, but this time I used basmati rice, and the results are comforting and delicious You could add something creamy to this if you wanted to – yogurt or milk or creme fraiche But I found it utterly satisfying with no further enrichment.
title: Creamy Leek Soup
title_page: Creamy Leek Soup Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
I usually pair leeks with potatoes to make a creamy puree, but this time I used basmati rice, and the results are comforting and delicious. You could add something creamy to this if you wanted to – yogurt or milk or creme fraiche. But I found it utterly satisfying with no further enrichment.
Featured in: Soups That Taste Like Spring.
Learn: How to Make Soup
